label: Typeform Webhook
name: typeformWebhook
description: Start workflow whenever Typeform webhook event happened

options.label: Typeform Submission
options.name: typeformSubmission
options.description: Triggered anytime form typeform submit a response sent through typeform webhook.

inputParameters.label: Form Id
inputParameters.name: formId
inputParameters.description: Unique ID for the form. Find in your form URL. For example, in the URL "https://mysite.typeform.com/to/u6nXL7" the form_id is u6nXL7

inputParameters.label: Webhook Tag
inputParameters.name: tag
inputParameters.description: The name you want to use for your webhook
